topic.title: Firmware Upgrade
topic.shortdesc: TA1600/2400/3200 can be upgraded to a new firmware version via network or locally. You can upgrade firmware via HTTP or TFTP.

body.p: Go to System System Preferences Firmware Update to upgrade the firmware.

ul.li: If Reset configuration to Factory Defaults is enabled, the system will be restored to factory default settings.
When updating the firmware, donâ€™t turn off the power. Or the system will be damaged.

If you are trying to upgrade through HTTP, make sure that your TA1600/2400/3200 is able to visit external network, or it cannot access Yeastar website to get the firmware file, causing the upgrade fail.
